creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: plum branch extending from UR with plum blossoms; inscription LRQ; gold flecked paper
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals

(Smiling to see the moon rise over the mountains, / I lie down drunk among the fragrant grasses; / Streams flow to the north and to the south - / One branch of plum bears two blossoms.) (SA) (see file)
markings: center R edge, oval intaglio; LLQ: two small square intaglio seals; LLQ, larger square intaglio
title: Plum Blossom Tanzaku
